member.name: MENUGETOBJECTINFO
member.summary: Contains information about the menu that the mouse cursor is on.

summary.para: The position of the mouse cursor with respect to the item indicated byuPos. It is a bitmask of the following values:

listheader.description: The mouse is on the bottom of the item indicated by uPos.
The mouse is on the top of the item indicated by uPos.

summary.para: If neither MNGOF_BOTTOMGAP nor MNGOF_TOPGAP is set, then the mouse is directly on the item indicated by uPos.

member.name: MENUGETOBJECTINFO.uPos
member.summary: The position of the item the mouse cursor is on.

member.name: MENUGETOBJECTINFO.hmenu
member.summary: A handle to the menu the mouse cursor is on.
